text: The 1986 FIBA European Super Cup was the 1st official edition of the FIBA European Super Cup for men's professional basketball clubs. The 2 game aggregate score tournament took place at the Dom Sportova arena in Zagreb, Yugoslavia, on October 7, 1986 and at the Palau Blaugrana, Barcelona, Spain, on October 28, 1986, in order to determine the unofficial European club super champion. The tournament was contested between the 1985–86 season FIBA European Champions Cup champions, Cibona, and the 1985–86 season FIBA European Cup Winners' Cup champions, FC Barcelona. ==Series summary== ===Game 1=== ===Game 2=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !1986 FIBA European Super Cup Champions |- | FC Barcelona 3rd title |} ==References== 1986 Category:1986–87 in European basketball Category:1986–87 in Spanish basketball Category:1986–87 in Yugoslav basketball Category:International basketball competitions hosted by Spain Category:International basketball competitions hosted by Yugoslavia Category:International basketball competitions hosted by Croatia Category:International basketball competitions hosted by Catalonia
title: 1986 FIBA European Super Cup
